snippet: Among the changes, the government will now give legal recognition to Alevi houses of worship, Prime Minister Ahmet Davutoglu said.
abstract: Turkish Prime Min Ahmet Davutoglu announces new reforms aimed at improving rights of country's Alevi Muslim minority.
lead_paragraph: Among the changes, the government will now give legal recognition to Alevi houses of worship, Prime Minister Ahmet Davutoglu said.

headline.main: Turkey Expands Rights of Alevis, a Muslim Minority
